infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show nearby properties and improve your search experience.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to let you take photos for your profile and property listings.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to let you upload images for your profile and property listings.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your contacts to help you invite friends and connect with people you know.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: This app would like to send you notifications about bookings, messages, and important updates.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses Face ID to securely autofill your login credentials.
infoPlist.NSSMSSendUsageDescription: This app needs permission to send SMS messages for verification and sharing properties.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location to show nearby properties and provide relevant services even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show nearby properties and provide relevant services even when the app is in the background.

permissionsPolicy.CAMERA: This app needs access to your camera to let you take photos for your profile and property listings.
permissionsPolicy.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This app needs access to your photo library to let you upload images for your profile and property listings.
permissionsPolicy.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This app needs to save photos and documents to your device storage.
permissionsPolicy.READ_MEDIA_IMAGES: This app needs access to your photo library to let you upload images for your profile and property listings.
permissionsPolicy.READ_MEDIA_VIDEO: This app needs access to your video library to let you upload videos for your property listings.
permissionsPolicy.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: This app uses your location to show nearby properties and improve your search experience.
permissionsPolicy.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: This app uses your location to show nearby properties and improve your search experience.
permissionsPolicy.ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION: This app uses your location to show nearby properties and provide relevant services even when the app is in the background.
permissionsPolicy.READ_CONTACTS: This app needs access to your contacts to help you invite friends and connect with people you know.
permissionsPolicy.SEND_SMS: This app needs permission to send SMS messages for verification and sharing properties.
permissionsPolicy.READ_CALENDAR: Allow Hoy to access your calendar to help schedule property viewings and bookings.
permissionsPolicy.WRITE_CALENDAR: Allow Hoy to access your calendar to help schedule property viewings and bookings.
permissionsPolicy.USE_BIOMETRIC: This app uses biometric authentication to securely access your account.
permissionsPolicy.USE_FINGERPRINT: This app uses fingerprint authentication to securely access your account.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Hoybnb to use your location.

plugins.iosUserTrackingPermission: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.

plugins.locationPermission: Allow Hoybnb to use your location

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use Face ID for secure authentication.

plugins.userTrackingPermission: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
